pkgmetadata.longdescription: Quantile-Based Clustering Algorithms // Various quantile-based clustering algorithms: algorithm CU (Common theta and Unscaled variables), algorithm CS (Common theta and Scaled variables through lambda_j), algorithm VU (Variable-wise theta_j and Unscaled variables) and algorithm VW (Variable-wise theta_j and Scaled variables through lambda_j). Hennig, C., Viroli, C., Anderlucci, L. (2019) "Quantile-based clustering." Electronic Journal of Statistics. 13 (2) 4849 - 4883 doi:10.1214/19-EJS1640.
